    public class KickstartCryptoKeyCommand
extends BaseKickstartCommand
    KickstartCryptoKeyCommand - class for updating the crypto keys associated with a kickstart profile

      • addKeysByDescriptionAndOrg

        public void addKeysByDescriptionAndOrg(java.util.List<java.lang.String> descriptions,
                              Org org)
        Adds a list of crypto keys to the kickstart profile where the list is a series of key descriptions.
        Parameters:
        descriptions - identifies all of the keys to associate
        org - org in which the keys are located
